entry.title: WIND WARNING , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 7:21 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
